data.title: Sony Music Labels Inc.｜Company Information｜Sony Music Group Corporate Site
data.meta_description: This is the company profile of Sony Music Labels Inc. - Sony Music Group.
data.text:
Principal Business

Sony Music Labels (SML) is a record company that plans, produces, and promotes commercial music and video products.

We support artists with a comprehensive strategy in finding artists, artist development and management, music production, marketing, and media promotion for releases in Japan as well as internationally. Our label business consists of a variety of labels each with signature distinctive traits.

Company Data
